title: Primeenergy director Clint Hurt sells $1.29 million in stock
author: Investing.com
excerpt: Primeenergy director Clint Hurt sells $1.29 million in stock
text: The total value of these transactions amounted to approximately $1.29 million. Following these sales, Hurt retains direct ownership of 300 shares and indirect ownership of 126,380 shares through Clint Hurts and Associates.
